# GitHub Repository Metadata

## Description
Card similarity search using tournament deck co-occurrence, graph embeddings, and hybrid ML models for trading card games (Magic: The Gathering, Pokemon, Yu-Gi-Oh).

## Topics (Recommended - 10 total)

### Core (5)
- `python` - Primary language
- `go` - Backend language  
- `machine-learning` - Core purpose
- `graph-neural-networks` - Key ML technique
- `embeddings` - ML approach

### Domain (3)
- `trading-card-games` - Domain
- `deck-building` - Application
- `similarity-search` - Use case

### Specific (2)
- `magic-the-gathering` - Primary game
- `node2vec` - Algorithm

## Alternative Topics (if space allows)
- `pokemon-tcg` - Secondary game
- `fastapi` - API framework
- `pytorch` - ML framework
- `gnn` - Abbreviation for graph-neural-networks

## Best Practices Applied

✅ **5-10 topics** (GitHub recommendation: 5-10)  
✅ **Mix general + specific** (python + graph-neural-networks)  
✅ **Include languages** (python, go)  
✅ **Domain-specific** (trading-card-games, deck-building)  
✅ **Key technologies** (embeddings, node2vec)  
✅ **Avoid over-tagging** (max 10-12 topics)

## Implementation

```bash
# Update description
gh repo edit --description "Card similarity search using tournament deck co-occurrence, graph embeddings, and hybrid ML models for trading card games"

# Add topics (GitHub allows up to 20, but 5-10 is recommended)
gh repo edit \
  --add-topic python \
  --add-topic go \
  --add-topic machine-learning \
  --add-topic graph-neural-networks \
  --add-topic embeddings \
  --add-topic trading-card-games \
  --add-topic deck-building \
  --add-topic similarity-search \
  --add-topic magic-the-gathering \
  --add-topic node2vec
```
